com.hms_networks.americas.sc.mqtt

Class MqttManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ewon.ewonitf.MqttClient
      • com.hms_networks.americas.sc.mqtt.MqttManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ewon.ewonitf.EvtIntListener, com.ewon.ewonitf.EvtListener

    public abstract class MqttManager
extends com.ewon.ewonitf.MqttClient
    A helper class for managing MQTT connections and their properties/configuration.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Thread mqttThread
      Thread used for running MQTT tasks on loop with a configured delay between executions.
      private boolean mqttThreadRun
      Boolean flag to control the MQTT thread loop.
      private long mqttThreadSleepIntervalMs
      Delay between executions of the MQTT thread.

      • Fields inherited from class com.ewon.ewonitf.MqttClient

        MQTT_MESSAGE_EVENT, MQTT_STATUS_EVENT

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void callMqttEvent(int event)
      Method inherited from super class (MqttClient) for handling MQTT events.

      Disconnects and ends the MQTT connection
      private void internalMqttThreadMethod()
      Internal (private) method that runs on mqttThread.
      abstract void onConnect()
      Abstract method to be implemented by the inheriting application for processing a successful MQTT connection.
      abstract void onError(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Abstract method to be implemented by the inheriting application for managing errors (exceptions) that occur in the MQTT manager.

      Abstract method to be implemented by the inheriting application for managing received MQTT messages.
      abstract void onStatus(int status)
      Abstract method to be implemented by the inheriting application for managing MQTT status changes.
      abstract void runOnMqttLoop()
      Abstract method to be implemented by the inheriting application for processing or performing tasks on the looping MQTT thread.
      void setAuthPassword(java.lang.String password)
      Configures the password of the MQTT client to the specified password.
      void setAuthUsername(java.lang.String username)
      Configures the username of the MQTT client to the specified username.
      void setCAFilePath(java.lang.String caFilePath)
      Configures the MQTT client to use the CA certificate located at the specified file path.
      void setCertFilePath(java.lang.String certFilePath)
      Configures the MQTT client to use the device certificate located at the specified file path.
      void setCertPaths(java.lang.String caFilePath, java.lang.String certFilePath, java.lang.String keyFilePath)
      Configures the certificate file paths of the MQTT client to the specified CA certificate, device certificate, and device key file paths.
      void setKeepAliveSecs(java.lang.String keepAliveSecs)
      Configures the keep alive setting of the MQTT client to the specified number of seconds.
      void setKeyFilePath(java.lang.String keyFilePath)
      Configures the MQTT client to use the device key located at the specified file path.
      void setLogLevel(java.lang.String logLevel)
      Configures the log level of the MQTT client to the specified level.
      void setMqttThreadSleepIntervalMs(long mqttThreadSleepIntervalMs)
      Set the sleep interval (in ms) for sleeping between intervals of the MQTT thread.
      void setPort(java.lang.String port)
      Configures the MQTT client to use the specified port.
      void setPortNonSecureDefault()
      Configures the MQTT client to use the default port for non-secure MQTT connections.
      void setPortSecureDefault()
      Configures the MQTT client to use the default port for secure MQTT connections.

      Configures the MQTT client to use the specified MQTT protocol version.
      void setTLSVersion(java.lang.String tlsVersion)
      Configures the TLS version of the MQTT client to the specified version.
      void setUsernamePassword(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Configures the username and password of the MQTT client to the specified username and password.
      void startMqttThread()
      Starts the MQTT thread.
      void stopMqttThread()
      Stops the MQTT thread (if it is running)

      Method to accompany the existing MqttClient.subscribe(String, int) method to allow for easy subscription to multiple MQTT topics in a list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MqttManager

        public MqttManager(java.lang.String mqttId,
                   java.lang.String mqttHost)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Main constructor for MQTT manager class. Required specified MQTT Client ID and MQTT Broker URL.
        Parameters:
        mqttId - MQTT client ID
        mqttHost - MQTT broker URL
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unable to create MQTT client

    • Method Detail

      • startMqttThread

        public void startMqttThread()
        Starts the MQTT thread. This method creates a new MQTT thread, and will overwrite existing ones.

      • stopMqttThread

        public void stopMqttThread()
        Stops the MQTT thread (if it is running)

      • setMqttThreadSleepIntervalMs

        Parameters:
        mqttThreadSleepIntervalMs - sleep interval (in ms)
